Privacy Policy

5. Sharing Information with Trusted Third Parties
Heartpace.com may use cookies to collect and use data from its visitors in the manners explained below.

Our website automatically collects certain data and stores it in log files.
We utilize this information to improve user experience and tailor our website to your preferences.
Heartpace.com may use cookies to collect and use data from its visitors in the manners explained below.

It's important to note that we never sell your personal information to any third parties.
We share this information solely with trusted third parties that assist us in delivering our services.
